description:
Sample values of an associated image along tracks.

By default, the value of the underlying image at each point along the track is written to either an ASCII file (with all values for each track on the same line), or a track scalar file (.tsf). Alternatively, some statistic can be taken from the values along each streamline and written to a vector file.

References:

* If using -precise option: Smith, R. E.; Tournier, J.-D.; Calamante, F. & Connelly, A. SIFT: Spherical-deconvolution informed filtering of tractograms. NeuroImage, 2013, 67, 298-312

stat_tck.title: stat_tck
stat_tck.description: compute some statistic from the values along each streamline (options are: mean,median,min,max)

nointerp.title: nointerp
nointerp.description: do not use trilinear interpolation when sampling image values

precise.title: precise
precise.description: use the precise mechanism for mapping streamlines to voxels (obviates the need for trilinear interpolation) (only applicable if some per-streamline statistic is requested)

use_tdi_fraction.title: use_tdi_fraction
use_tdi_fraction.description: each streamline is assigned a fraction of the image intensity in each voxel based on the fraction of the track density contributed by that streamline (this is only appropriate for processing a whole-brain tractogram, and images for which the quantiative parameter is additive)

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.
